question: 出張
sourceMnemonic: You <kanji>exit</kanji> the building and <kanji>stretch</kanji> in preparation for your <vocabulary>business trip</vocabulary>. This is the routine you always follow for your business trips: exit, and stretch.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Just be careful about <ja>しゅつ</ja> becoming <ja>しゅっ</ja> here!
